item.title: List of mind-bending movies
item.description: Mind-bending/non-linear/mind-twisting movies have a special place in my heart. So here’s a list of some non-linear movies that I’ve watched, those of which I can remember at the moment. Inception Interstellar Identity (2003) Mr. Nobody (2009) Mulholland Drive Knock at the Cabin Memento (2000) Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind (2004) Groundhog Day Black Swan (2010) Pi (1998) The Butterfly Effect (2004) Triangle (2009) Confessions (2010) [Japanese] Donnie Darko (2001) 3-Iron (2004) [Korean] Be With You (2018) [Korean] The Man from Earth (2007) Birdman (2014) The Fountain (2006) Timecrimes (2007) [Spanish] Paprika (2006) [Anime] Mirage (2018) [Spanish] The Double (2013) Predestination (2014) Synecdoche, New York (2008) Primer (2004) Enemy (2013) Vanilla Sky (2001) Looper (2012) The Others (2001) Mother!
